CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 4-9 Typical BHJ devices comprise a phaseseparated donor / acceptor blend layer with low band gap conjugated polymers as the electron donor , and fullerene derivatives such as [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester ( PC61BM ) or [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as the electron acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

Material Name
----------------
low band gap conjugated polymers
[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM)
[6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Material Name
----------------
low band gap conjugated polymers
[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM)
[6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM)

I have removed the term "fullerene derivatives" as it is a general category and not a specific material name.
